analyzed: de'i tshe bdag nyid thams cad rtogs pa yang dus gzhan du kun du rgyu ba ni ma yin te /

analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu med du zin kyang de'i mthar thug par yang rtogs pa yin na /

analyzed: de'i phyir snga ma ni phyi ma las rim pa dang rgyu @217a * //

original: nyid kyang yin te /
analyzed: nyid kyang yin te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe de dang de las 'byung ba ni de las gzhan pa las yin par ma dmigs pa'i phyir de'i bskyed bya nyid yin no //

analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid yul du byed pa yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid du yod par rtogs pa yin no //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na rim gyis byed pa yin par yang grub par bstan pa ni /

analyzed: de kho na bzhin du rgyu yang yin te /

analyzed: de la yang de kho na bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen to be just like that.

analyzed: me dang du bdag gi phan 'dogs byed dang phan gdags bya yin pa bzhin du lhan cig pa ma yin no //
translated: Like fire and smoke, they are not simultaneous, with one helping the other.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa las tshogs pa skye ba ma yin la 'di la bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa las tshogs pa skye ba ma yin la 'di la bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the collection does not arise from the collection, and because of the reversal of this,üîΩwhy does it not arise in the same way?

analyzed: ci'i phyir de bzhin du skye ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: skye ba 'di la ni de bzhin du 'gyur na skye ba phyi ma la ji ltar yin snyam du sems pa la /

analyzed: de la yang skye ba dang po la blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus su dmigs pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa can kho na'i lus ni du ba las me bzhin nam /

original: yan lag gi rnam par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mngon par 'byung ba las bzhin du de'i rgyu yin par rjes su dpog pa yin par bstan pa ni /

analyzed: des na blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus zhes bya ba ste /

translated: The body that is produced by the body is the cause of the mind. The body that is observed from moment to moment exists at the beginning and end of craving. It is superior to other bodies that are its causal basis. Therefore it establishes another existence. This is the meaning.

original: to // skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la dus gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba med pa'i phyir ci 'dra ba'i rim pa yin /
analyzed: to // skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la dus gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba med pa'i phyir ci 'dra ba'i rim pa yin /

original: gang gi phyir dus kyi dbye bas bya @217b ba dang ldan pa tha dad pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dus kyi dbye bas bya @217b ba dang ldan pa tha dad pa yin na /

original: rim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: then a sequence would occur, but not otherwise.

original: skad cig ma'i dngos po las skad cig snga ma snga ma las phyi ma phyi ma 'byung ba kho nar rim pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i dngos po las skad cig snga ma snga ma las phyi ma phyi ma 'byung ba kho nar rim pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin gyi /
translated: The convention of sequence is the domain of the later arising from the earlier momentary thing,üîΩbut not otherwise.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate this, it is said:

original: sngon med skad cig re re yi //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sngon med skad cig re re yi // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Each moment is unprecedented.

original: gang gi phyir skad cig ma la yang rim pa dang ldan pa'i yul ni blo'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skad cig ma la yang rim pa dang ldan pa'i yul ni blo'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Since the domain of sequence is the cause of cognition,

original: de lta bu'i 'bras bu 'byung bar byed pa srid pa'i dang po la mthong ba ji lta ba de bzhin du mtha' ma la yang de kho na ltar mthong ba de lta bu kho na rang las byung ba'i lus gzhan 'phen par 'dod pa'i phyir skye ba phyiüîΩma grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'bras bu 'byung bar byed pa srid pa'i dang po la mthong ba ji lta ba de bzhin du mtha' ma la yang de kho na ltar mthong ba de lta bu kho na rang las byung ba'i lus gzhan 'phen par 'dod pa'i phyir skye ba phyi ma grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The point of this is to show that the next birth is established because it is asserted that the last moment of existence projects another body that arises from itself.

original: de'i phyir na dus kun du rgyur mthong ba nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir na dus kun du rgyur mthong ba nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the cause is seen at all times.

original: blo'i rgyu lus kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blo'i rgyu lus kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the mind is the product of the body, the cause.

original: skye ba dang po la de lta bu'i lus gzhan 'phen par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skye ba dang po la de lta bu'i lus gzhan 'phen par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The point is that the first moment of birth projects another body that is like that.

original: yang na skad cig ma nyid yin yang skad cig ma snga ma nyid thams cad kyi byed pa po yin pas ci'i phyir 'bras bu cig car ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang na skad cig ma nyid yin yang skad cig ma snga ma nyid thams cad kyi byed pa po yin pas ci'i phyir 'bras bu cig car ma yin zhe na /
translated: Or, even if it is momentary, since the previous moment is the agent of all, why is the effect not simultaneous?

original: sngon med skad cig re re ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: sngon med skad cig re re ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: Each moment that did not exist before is the effect.

original: snga ma snga ma ni rgyu gzhan dang gzhan yin la de bzhin nyid re re ni ma yin na gang gis cig car ba'i skyon du 'gyur /
analyzed: snga ma snga ma ni rgyu gzhan dang gzhan yin la de bzhin nyid re re ni ma yin na gang gis cig car ba'i skyon du 'gyur /
translated: If the former and latter moments are different causes, and suchness is not each of them, then how could the error of simultaneity arise?

original: de'i phyir rgyu min pa nyid de rtag pa nyid yin la /üîΩrtag pa nyid ni dus kun du ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu min pa nyid de rtag pa nyid yin la / rtag pa nyid ni dus kun du ste /
translated: Therefore, it is not a cause, and it is permanent.üîΩPermanence is seen to be simultaneous,

original: dus thams cad khyab par byed pa nyid du cig car mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: dus thams cad khyab par byed pa nyid du cig car mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: pervading all times.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is not anything else.

original: yang na rgyu'i zhig pa ni rgyu las gzhan ma yin la des na de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid la yang 'bras bu cig car bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na rgyu'i zhig pa ni rgyu las gzhan ma yin la des na de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid la yang 'bras bu cig car bar 'gyur te /
translated: Or, the disintegration of the cause is not different from the cause, and therefore the effect that arises simultaneously with it arises simultaneously with the cause, because it arises simultaneously with the cause.

original: de dad de ni 'di kho na las 'byung ngo snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de dad de ni 'di kho na las 'byung ngo snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that the effect arises from just that cause,

original: sngon med skad cig re re zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: sngon med skad cig re re zhes bya ba ste //
translated: then it would be momentary.

original: dus nges pa'i dngos po ni yul nges pa bzhin du yul gzhan dang gzhan nyid las ldog pa yin gyi rang gi dus la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dus nges pa'i dngos po ni yul nges pa bzhin du yul gzhan dang gzhan nyid las ldog pa yin gyi rang gi dus la ni ma yin te /
translated: A thing that is ascertained in terms of time is the opposite of being different from another object, just as it is the opposite of another object. But it is not the opposite of its own time,

original: rang nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would not exist.

original: ldog pa ni ldog pa po las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa ni ldog pa po las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: The opposite is not different from the opposite,

original: de lta yin na ni dngos po mi 'jig par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni dngos po mi 'jig par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if that were the case, it would follow that things would not disintegrate.

original: de'i phyir gnyis pa kho na snga ma zhig pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis pa kho na snga ma zhig pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, only the second is the disintegration of the prior.

original: zhig pa dang phyed zhig pa dang ma zhig pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams skad cig ma'i phyogs la skyon ma yin te /üîΩ'bras bu'i snga rol na med par @218a * //
analyzed: zhig pa dang phyed zhig pa dang ma zhig pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams skad cig ma'i phyogs la skyon ma yin te / 'bras bu'i snga rol na med par @218a * //
translated: The conceptual thoughts of disintegration, partial disintegration, non-disintegration, and so on are not errors in the context of momentariness,

original: khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that prior to the effect it does not exist.

original: skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid la 'bras bu'i skye pa dgos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid la 'bras bu'i skye pa dgos pa ma yin te /
translated: The arising of the effect is not dependent on momentariness or non-momentariness.

original: de lta mod kyi nges kyang rang nyid thob pa'i don du yod pa la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi nges kyang rang nyid thob pa'i don du yod pa la ltos pa yin la /
translated: However, it is also the case that it depends on existence for the sake of obtaining itself.

original: de yang gang gi tshe ltos pa kho na yin gyi de'i tshe 'bras bu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang gang gi tshe ltos pa kho na yin gyi de'i tshe 'bras bu ni ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, when it is dependent, it is not a result,

original: ltos pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it is not dependent.

original: gang gi phyir ltos pa zhes bya ba ni de las rang nyid 'thob pa yin gyi thob pa'i bdag nyid can la ni de mi srid pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ltos pa zhes bya ba ni de las rang nyid 'thob pa yin gyi thob pa'i bdag nyid can la ni de mi srid pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is that what is called ‚Äúdependent‚Äù is obtained from that, but it is not possible for that which has the nature of being obtained,

original: mi ltos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi ltos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it is not dependent.

original: yod pa'i yang snga na yod pa nyid ni 'bras bu'i ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: yod pa'i yang snga na yod pa nyid ni 'bras bu'i ltos pa yin te /
translated: The prior existence of the existent is the dependence of the result,

original: des 'phangs pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des 'phangs pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is understood to be that which is projected.

original: cig shos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: cig shos ni ma yin te /
translated: The other is not,

original: de'i phyir de kho na rgyu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na rgyu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: because that is the very reason for being a cause.

original: 'bras bu'i dus na mi gnas pa la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus na mi gnas pa la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is that it is also similar in the case of that which does not endure at the time of the result.

original: de'i phyir na dus kun du rgyur mthong bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir na dus kun du rgyur mthong bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: Therefore, it is seen as a cause at all times.

original: dus kun du ste thams cad la zhes bya ba la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: dus kun du ste thams cad la zhes bya ba la ltos pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúAt all times‚Äù means ‚Äúin all cases.‚Äù

original: rtag pa nyid la ni tshad ma ci yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la ni tshad ma ci yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: But there is no valid cognition whatsoever that establishes permanence.

original: blo'i rim pa ni /
analyzed: blo'i rim pa ni /
translated: The order of the mind

original: rgyu lus kyi yang rim par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu lus kyi yang rim par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is understood in terms of the order of the body, which is its cause.

original: blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus kho na gnas skabs pa yin no //
analyzed: blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus kho na gnas skabs pa yin no //
translated: The body that is simultaneous with the mind is the present body.

original: de'i phyir lus kyi bskyed bya'i blo ni lus dang lhan cig pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir lus kyi bskyed bya'i blo ni lus dang lhan cig pa kho na yin la /
translated: Therefore, the mind that is produced by the body is simultaneous with the body.

original: blo'i rgyu lus ni de yang blo dang lhan cig pa kho nar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: blo'i rgyu lus ni de yang blo dang lhan cig pa kho nar bstan pa yin no //
translated: The body that is the cause of the mind is also taught to be simultaneous with the mind.

original: des na blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus kyi rgyu yang skye ba dang po la de lta bu kho na yin par 'di las go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: des na blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus kyi rgyu yang skye ba dang po la de lta bu kho na yin par 'di las go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the cause of the body that is simultaneous with the mind is understood from this to be just like that in the first birth.

original: skye ba phyi ma la yang de lta bu'i rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu yang de lta bu kho na yin par ji ltar mthong bas rtogs par bya ba la yin zhes bya ba'i thob pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba phyi ma la yang de lta bu'i rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu yang de lta bu kho na yin par ji ltar mthong bas rtogs par bya ba la yin zhes bya ba'i thob pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: And in subsequent births, the effect is understood from seeing the cause to be just like that, as it is seen.üîΩThus, it is established that the body that is simultaneous with the mind is the cause of the mind.

original: gang kho na blo'i lhan cig byed pa'i lus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang kho na blo'i lhan cig byed pa'i lus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is the body that is the simultaneous cause of the cognition.

original: 'on te 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
translated: But what is the means of apprehending the relation?

original: de'i phyir lhan cig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lhan cig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúsimultaneously.‚Äù

original: lan cig kyang rang gi dus su 'dzin par mthong bas 'di'i 'bras bu yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma dang phyi ma la ltos pa'i ngo bo mi 'dzin pa kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: lan cig kyang rang gi dus su 'dzin par mthong bas 'di'i 'bras bu yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma dang phyi ma la ltos pa'i ngo bo mi 'dzin pa kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: But is it not the case that the cognition does not apprehend the nature of the prior and subsequent moments, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is the effect of that‚Äù?

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe relation of cause and effect.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa ni tha snyad du grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa ni tha snyad du grub pa yin no //
translated: The effect and so on are established conventionally.

original: ji skad rtogs pas 'brel par byed pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad rtogs pas 'brel par byed pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said that the relation is made by the cognition.

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par rtog @218b pas go bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par rtog @218b pas go bar bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, the object to be understood by the conceptual cognition that has the nature of positive and negative concomitance

original: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the effect and so on, not anything else. This is the meaning.

original: gal te yang blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus ni de dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang / rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtogs byed du 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang blo dang lhan cig pa'i lus ni de dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang / rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtogs byed du 'dod pa yin na /
translated: If you maintain that the body along with the mind is the cause of the effect that is similar to it,

original: 'gal ba can 'chi ba mthong ba'i phyir dro ba mthong ba las grang ba bzhin du med par yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba can 'chi ba mthong ba'i phyir dro ba mthong ba las grang ba bzhin du med par yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, because of the contradiction of seeing death, you would understand that it does not exist, just as you understand that cold does not exist when you see heat.

original: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa'i sems rgyun du yod pa ni 'chi ba yod na med pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa'i sems rgyun du yod pa ni 'chi ba yod na med pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The mind that exists in the continuum, which is not deficient in its causes, is contradictory to death, because when there is death, it does not exist.

original: dgra bcom pa'i rgyun la khyed kyang 'di khas len pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i rgyun la khyed kyang 'di khas len pa yin gyi /
translated: You accept this in the case of the continuum of an arhat.

original: ma rig pa dang srid pa med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa la 'bras bu nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ma rig pa dang srid pa med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa la 'bras bu nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ma yin la /
translated: Because ignorance and craving do not exist, the arhat does not link with a subsequent effect.

original: de dag med kyang 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs la yang mtshams sbyor ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag med kyang 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs la yang mtshams sbyor ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though they do not exist, you see that the arhat links with a subsequent existence while he is alive.

original: skad cig ma zhig pa ni 'chi ba ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma zhig pa ni 'chi ba ma yin te /
translated: The destruction of a moment is not death.

original: de yod kyang 'tsho'i gnas skabs na mtshams sbyor par mthong ba'i 'gal ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yod kyang 'tsho'i gnas skabs na mtshams sbyor par mthong ba'i 'gal ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it exists, then it follows that there is no contradiction in seeing that it links the two occasions of life.

original: rgyun chad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyun chad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there a complete cessation of the mind,

original: de'i bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on kyang de'i rgyu'i dngos po ni gnyid log pa bzhin nam /
analyzed: de'i bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro // 'on kyang de'i rgyu'i dngos po ni gnyid log pa bzhin nam /
translated: because that is what is to be proven.üîΩHowever, the state of being a cause is not a complete cessation,

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lta bu'i rgyun chad pa las gzhan pa'i rgyun chad pa ni /üîΩgzhan du mi 'thad par go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lta bu'i rgyun chad pa las gzhan pa'i rgyun chad pa ni / gzhan du mi 'thad par go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: like the mind of one who is asleep or the mind of one who has entered the meditative absorption of cessation.üîΩIt is understood that a complete cessation of the mind is not tenable in any other situation.

original: der rgyun chad pa mtshams sbyor bar rigs pa ni ma yin to /
analyzed: der rgyun chad pa mtshams sbyor bar rigs pa ni ma yin to /
translated: It is not reasonable that a complete cessation of the mind links with a subsequent mind.

original: gang gi phyir gnyid log pa la sogs pa na 'gag pa'i sems ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gnyid log pa la sogs pa na 'gag pa'i sems ni /
translated: Because the mind that has ceased in sleep and so on

original: de nyid kyi tshe gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba ma yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba ma yin la /
translated: does not link with another mind at that time.

original: gnas pas 'phangs pa'i las med pa tsam ni 'chi ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas pas 'phangs pa'i las med pa tsam ni 'chi ba ma yin te /
translated: The mere absence of karma projected by the mind that abides is not death,

original: gnyid log pa la sogs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid log pa la sogs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because sleep and so on are not seen to be death.

original: de'i dus su byung ba rgyun chad pa yang ma yin 'chi ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i dus su byung ba rgyun chad pa yang ma yin 'chi ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the stream is cut off, nor is it that there is death,

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not seen.

original: rnam shes dang tshe 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'chi ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam shes dang tshe 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'chi ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the characteristic of the cessation of consciousness and life force is death,

original: yang de lta yin du zin kyang 'gal ba gnyid log pa bzhin du ji ltar mtshams sbyor bar byed ces smras pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de lta yin du zin kyang 'gal ba gnyid log pa bzhin du ji ltar mtshams sbyor bar byed ces smras pa yin no //
translated: we say that even if that were so, how could there be rebirth, like the cessation of sleep?

original: rgyun chad pa'i 'gag pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyun chad pa'i 'gag pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba med pa yin no //
translated: The cessation of the stream is not rebirth, because it is incompatible with the noncessation of the stream.

original: gnyid log pa'i 'gag pa bzhin du mtshams sbyor ba dang 'brel pa can gyi 'chi ba ni 'gag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyid log pa'i 'gag pa bzhin du mtshams sbyor ba dang 'brel pa can gyi 'chi ba ni 'gag pa ma yin te /
translated: Death, which is related to rebirth, is not a cessation, like the cessation of sleep,

original: de ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not seen.

original: tshad ma thams cad nub pa na yod pa srid par yang nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma thams cad nub pa na yod pa srid par yang nus pa ma yin te /
translated: When all valid cognitions have ceased, it is not possible that existence is possible,

original: gtan tshigs kyi 'gran zla rnyed bla @219a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi 'gran zla rnyed bla @219a * //
translated: because the opponent has not found a reason.

original: ba'i phyir rgyun chad pa dang mtshams nyid mi mthun par tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba'i phyir rgyun chad pa dang mtshams nyid mi mthun par tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by valid cognition that the continuum is severed and the mind is not homogeneous.

original: de'i phyir rgyu las sam 'bras bu las 'chi ba'i 'og tu 'bras bu dang rgyu dag shes pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu las sam 'bras bu las 'chi ba'i 'og tu 'bras bu dang rgyu dag shes pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, after death, the effect or cause is not known,

original: 'chi bas bar du bcad pas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chi bas bar du bcad pas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not produced due to death interrupting the continuum.

original: bar du gcod pa med na skye ba yin pa ni /
analyzed: bar du gcod pa med na skye ba yin pa ni /
translated: If there is no interruption, it is producedüîΩin accordance with the situation.

original: de lta'i gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de lta'i gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: This is the analysis.

original: tha ma'i sems ni sems gzhan dang mtshams sbyor zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tha ma'i sems ni sems gzhan dang mtshams sbyor zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The final mind is the mind that connects with another mind.

original: re zhig gnyid log pa la sogs pa bzhin du rnam shes la sogs pa 'gag pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig gnyid log pa la sogs pa bzhin du rnam shes la sogs pa 'gag pa ni /
translated: First, the cessation of consciousness and so on is like the cessation of sleep and so on.

original: gnas pa 'phen par byed pa'i las 'gag pa kho na las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa 'phen par byed pa'i las 'gag pa kho na las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not due to anything other than the cessation of the projecting karma.

original: 'di yod na gzhan shugs kyis mi 'thob pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'di yod na gzhan shugs kyis mi 'thob pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because if this exists, the other is not obtained by implication.

original: gnas pa'i 'phen byed yod pas 'gag pa ni gzhan du mi mthad pa yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa'i 'phen byed yod pas 'gag pa ni gzhan du mi mthad pa yin te /
translated: Since there is a projecting cause of abiding, it is not tenable that it ceases elsewhere.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan 'phen byed yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan 'phen byed yin no //
translated: The reason is that there is another projecting cause.

original: de la yang gnyid log pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de la yang gnyid log pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: They say that it is sleep.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod du chug kyang de yang mtshams sbyor ba dang 'gal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod du chug kyang de yang mtshams sbyor ba dang 'gal ba ma yin te /
translated: Even if there were another reason, that would not contradict the link of the present existence with the previous existence,

original: gnyid log pa kho na bzhin du dus nyung zad cig 'gag pa yang skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid log pa kho na bzhin du dus nyung zad cig 'gag pa yang skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen that a small amount of time ceases and is born, just as sleep does.

original: 'di la yang ma mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la yang ma mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: They say that this is not seen.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: skye ba dang po'i sems dang lus kyang goms pa la sogs pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par du mthong ba las skye ba snga ma'i mtha'i sems mtshams sbyor ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang po'i sems dang lus kyang goms pa la sogs pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par du mthong ba las skye ba snga ma'i mtha'i sems mtshams sbyor ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the first mind and body of this life are seen to be special effects of the cause of habituation and so on, and the mind at the end of the previous life links with this life through inference.

original: dgra bcom pa'i sems kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i sems kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the mind of an arhat would be the same.

original: 'gyur ba yang skyon ci yod rgyu ma chang ba las de mtshams sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba yang skyon ci yod rgyu ma chang ba las de mtshams sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'thad pa yin no //
translated: And the change is also tenable, because there is no fault, since it is not a link to that which is not a cause.

original: sems gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba ni yul la'o //
analyzed: sems gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba ni yul la'o //
translated: The linking of another mind is to an object.

original: tha ma'i sems ni 'chi ba'i sems so //
analyzed: tha ma'i sems ni 'chi ba'i sems so //
translated: The final mind is the mind of death.

original: 'gal ci yod ni med pa ste 'gegs par byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal ci yod ni med pa ste 'gegs par byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the contradiction? There is none. The meaning is that there is no obstruction.

original: 'ga' ba can nyid ni 'gegs par byed pa yin par brjod do //
analyzed: 'ga' ba can nyid ni 'gegs par byed pa yin par brjod do //
translated: Obstruction is said to be the very thing that is contradicted.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las snga ma dang phyi ma'i skye ba 'grub pa dang 'gal ba dmigs pa yin pas de mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las snga ma dang phyi ma'i skye ba 'grub pa dang 'gal ba dmigs pa yin pas de mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the establishment of the contradiction of the prior and subsequent arising from the effect-reason is observed, it is not established.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: One may think that the non-erroneous contradiction is the cause of doubt.

original: gal te ji ltar dbus kyi gnas shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ji ltar dbus kyi gnas shes par bya ba'o //
translated: If so, how is the middle ground to be known?

original: 'dod chags bral ba'i 'chi ba'i sems dang nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni dro ba dang grang ba bzhin du 'gal bar mthong ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags bral ba'i 'chi ba'i sems dang nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni dro ba dang grang ba bzhin du 'gal bar mthong ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The verse says,

original: gang gang @219b 'chi sems de dang de //
analyzed: gang gang @219b 'chi sems de dang de //
translated: Whatever thought is present at the time of death,

original: zhes bya'o // 'chi ba ni sems skad cig phyi ma la med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'chi ba ni sems skad cig phyi ma la med pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt death the nonexistence of consciousness in the next moment?

original: de ni mtshams sbyor ba dang 'gal ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni mtshams sbyor ba dang 'gal ba can ma yin te /
translated: It is not mutually exclusive with linking,

original: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs na 'gal bar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs na 'gal bar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen to be mutually exclusive in the state of life.üîΩYou think that this explains the absence of error, but

original: 'dis ni skyon med par yang bshad pa yin no snyam du sems pas zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni skyon med par yang bshad pa yin no snyam du sems pas zer ba ni /
translated: the verse says,

original: 'chi ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Whatever thought is present at the time of death,

original: rnam shes med pa tsam ni 'chi ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam shes med pa tsam ni 'chi ba ma yin te /
translated: Death is not merely the absence of consciousness,

original: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs bzhin du de nyid kyi tshe mtshams sbyor bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs bzhin du de nyid kyi tshe mtshams sbyor bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would then follow that linking would occur at that time, just as it does in the state of life.

original: rgyun med pa la yang 'chi ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyun med pa la yang 'chi ba ma yin te /
translated: Death is not the absence of a continuum,üîΩbecause it would then follow that death would occur in the formless realm.

original: rgyun med pa ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'dod pa grub pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyun med pa ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'dod pa grub pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of a continuum is established by the mere fact that there is no connection.

original: gnyid log pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyid log pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the same as sleep, etc.,

original: de nyid kyi tshe mtshams sbyor bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe mtshams sbyor bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that at that time there would be a connection.

original: 'gal ba'i bsgrub bya dag gis khyab pa yod kyang chos can gcig la bsgrub bya gnyis ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i bsgrub bya dag gis khyab pa yod kyang chos can gcig la bsgrub bya gnyis ma yin te /
translated: Even if there is a pervasion by two predicates of the same subject, it is not the case that there are two predicates of the same subject,üîΩbecause it is illogical. Nor is it the case that there is a contradiction or an obstruction, because they are of equal strength and because there is a pervasion.

original: mi rigs pa'i phyir gnod pa dang bar du gcod pa yang ma yin te stobs mtshungs ba'i phyir dang / khyab pa yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la sgrub byed dang gnod byed dag ni 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: mi rigs pa'i phyir gnod pa dang bar du gcod pa yang ma yin te stobs mtshungs ba'i phyir dang / khyab pa yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la sgrub byed dang gnod byed dag ni 'gal ba yin la /
translated: The thought is that it is logical that the establishment and the contradiction are contradictory,

original: bar du gcod ba ni khyab pa kho na yin na rigs pa yin gyi gzhan du na gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bar du gcod ba ni khyab pa kho na yin na rigs pa yin gyi gzhan du na gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: and that the obstruction is only a pervasion. But if it were otherwise, it would be an obstruction.üîΩTo demonstrate this he says,

original: 'on te bzlog pas zhes bya ba nas mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'on te bzlog pas zhes bya ba nas mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOr, if it were the opposite, etc., up to it would be the same.‚Äù

original: 'gal ba'am bar du chod pa 'am yod pa dang med pa yang rung ba khas blangs pa kho na 'di sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba'am bar du chod pa 'am yod pa dang med pa yang rung ba khas blangs pa kho na 'di sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the demonstration of the proof that the assertion of contradiction, or of an interval, or of existence and non-existence, is just a sophistry.

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: 'on kyang 'chi ba ni mtshams sbyor ba dang 'gal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'chi ba ni mtshams sbyor ba dang 'gal ba ma yin te /
translated: However, death is not contradictory to re-linking,

original: gnas pa'i rgyun 'gag pa yin na rnam shes 'gag pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyun 'gag pa yin na rnam shes 'gag pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cessation of the continuum of life, and because it is the cessation of consciousness.

original: 'gal ba zhes bya ba kho nas mtshams sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba zhes bya ba kho nas mtshams sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Re-linking is not just called ‚Äúcontradictory,‚Äù

original: rgyu gzhan gyis 'phangs pas mtshams sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan gyis 'phangs pas mtshams sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because re-linking is projected by another cause.

original: de bzhin du skye ba'i dang po'i sems goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba'i dang po'i sems goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par ni /
translated: In the same way, the special object to be produced by the first mind of birthüîΩis understood to be projected by another mind of the same type.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i sems gzhan gyis 'phangs pa yin par rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i sems gzhan gyis 'phangs pa yin par rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of this is:üîΩThe mind of death

original: 'chi ba'i sems ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i sems ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mind at death.üîΩ

original: dgag bya mtshams sbyor ba la de bzhin du de'i yul la yang yin par rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: dgag bya mtshams sbyor ba la de bzhin du de'i yul la yang yin par rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The object of that is also like that.

original: re zhig sems ni sems gzhan @220a * //
analyzed: re zhig sems ni sems gzhan @220a * //
translated: For a while, the mind is another mind.üîΩ

original: dang 'gal ba ma yin la /
analyzed: dang 'gal ba ma yin la /
translated: For a while, the mind is not in conflict with another mind.

original: de bzhin du 'chi ba yang de med pa'i ngo bo 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs lta bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'chi ba yang de med pa'i ngo bo 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs lta bu'o //
translated: And so too, death is like the state of life, which is the absence of that.

original: gnyid log pa bzhin du rtog pa yang ma yin te /üîΩtshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid log pa bzhin du rtog pa yang ma yin te / tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it like sleep, because there is no valid cognition.

original: gnas pa'i rgyu yod kyang sems 'gags pas de'i rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyu yod kyang sems 'gags pas de'i rtog pa yin no //
translated: Even though there is a cause for remaining, the mind ceases, and so it is imagined that it ceases.

original: dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'di la yang gnas pa'i rgyu ni yod pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'di la yang gnas pa'i rgyu ni yod pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: And in untimely death, there is only a cause for remaining.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, because

original: yang ba ma spangs pa kho nas der sems 'gag pa la 'gag byed gzhan du rtog pa la ni /
analyzed: yang ba ma spangs pa kho nas der sems 'gag pa la 'gag byed gzhan du rtog pa la ni /
translated: the mind ceases there due to the mere non-abandonment of lightness. There is no valid cognition for the imagination that there is another cause for cessation.

original: tshad ma med do zhes bstan pa ni lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dam zhes bya ba rgyu ma tshang ba med pa yin pa ni gzhan yod na med pa zhes bya ba'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid dam zhes bya bas mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma med do zhes bstan pa ni lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dam zhes bya ba rgyu ma tshang ba med pa yin pa ni gzhan yod na med pa zhes bya ba'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid dam zhes bya bas mtshon pa yin no //
translated: This is taught by the phrase ‚Äúthe characteristic of non-coexistence‚Äù and so on. The phrase ‚Äúwhen one exists, the other does not exist‚Äù illustrates the characteristic of contradiction.

original: 'chi ba'i sems nyid 'ongs na zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i sems nyid dang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa nyid dang 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i sems nyid 'ongs na zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i sems nyid dang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa nyid dang 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the mind of death itself arises‚Äù means that there is no contradiction in connecting with the mind of death itself.

original: re zhig sems ni rang nyid kyi rang rig par bya ba yin la gzhan gyi tha snyad rjes su dpag bya ma yin nam /
analyzed: re zhig sems ni rang nyid kyi rang rig par bya ba yin la gzhan gyi tha snyad rjes su dpag bya ma yin nam /
translated: First, the mind is itself the object of reflexive awareness, and it is not inferred by the conventions of others.

original: de 'gag par yang nges pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de 'gag par yang nges pa kho na yin te /
translated: It is certain that it ceases.

original: de lta bu'i sems yod na de'i 'bras bu med par mi rigs la de lta bu'i 'gag pa gzhan lta bu'i mtshams sbyor ba yin par yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems yod na de'i 'bras bu med par mi rigs la de lta bu'i 'gag pa gzhan lta bu'i mtshams sbyor ba yin par yang mi rigs te /
translated: If such a mind exists, it is illogical that its effect does not exist. It is also illogical that such a cessation connects with another,

original: gnyid log pa la sogs pa la ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid log pa la sogs pa la ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen in sleep and so on.

original: de'i phyir 'chi ba la sogs pa yin na de lta bu'i sems kyi rgyun nub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'chi ba la sogs pa yin na de lta bu'i sems kyi rgyun nub pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, when death and so on occur, the continuum of such a mind subsides.

original: snang ba bzhin du mun pa 'gal bar rtogs pa yod pa kho na yin na de'i phyir de ji ltar mtshams sbyor ba las bzlog pa mthong ba med pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: snang ba bzhin du mun pa 'gal bar rtogs pa yod pa kho na yin na de'i phyir de ji ltar mtshams sbyor ba las bzlog pa mthong ba med pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If it is thought that darkness is incompatible with light, then how could the opposite of that connection be seen?

original: gnyid log pa'i dus bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus na 'gag pa yang rmi lam gyi yul bzhin du skye ba phyi ma'i lus mtshams sbyor ba bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyid log pa'i dus bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus na 'gag pa yang rmi lam gyi yul bzhin du skye ba phyi ma'i lus mtshams sbyor ba bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as when one is asleep, so at the time of death, the cessation of the body is established, like the object of a dream, as the connection to the body of the next life.

original: de dang 'gal bar rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'gal bar rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that the opposite of that is realized,

original: 'chi ba'i 'og tu de bzlog pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / de'i tshe de ma 'ongs pa nyid kyis dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'og tu de bzlog pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / de'i tshe de ma 'ongs pa nyid kyis dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because after death, the opposite of that is not realized, and at that time, it is beyond the senses because it is future.

original: me dang dus phyis 'byung ba'i grang ba'i rgyun 'gal ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: me dang dus phyis 'byung ba'i grang ba'i rgyun 'gal ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The opposite of heat is not cold that occurs later,

original: rgyu ma tshang ba yod na gzhan yod pas med pa 'gal bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang ba yod na gzhan yod pas med pa 'gal bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
translated: because if there is an incomplete cause, the existence of one thing is not incompatible with the nonexistence of another.

original: skye ba gzhan mtshams sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: skye ba gzhan mtshams sbyor ba ni /
translated: With this intention, the connection to another birth

original: snang du rung ba ma yin no //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang du rung ba ma yin no // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not suitable to appear.

original: rmi lam bzhin @220b du 'chi ba na dus gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba ma mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: rmi lam bzhin @220b du 'chi ba na dus gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba ma mthong ba yin na /
translated: If one does not see the link to another life after death, like a dream,

original: ji ltar khas len pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar khas len pa yin zhe na /
translated: how can one accept it?

original: ma yin te skye ba dang po'i lus dang sems dag rang gi rigs pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par can ni de'i 'bras bu yin par go ba yin na /
analyzed: ma yin te skye ba dang po'i lus dang sems dag rang gi rigs pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par can ni de'i 'bras bu yin par go ba yin na /
translated: If the body and mind of the first birth are the special effect of what is to be produced by its type,

original: ji ltar mtshams mi sbyor ba yin te /üîΩbzlog par mthong ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshams mi sbyor ba yin te / bzlog par mthong ba'i phyir ro /
translated: how can there be no link to another life?

original: zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because it is seen that the opposite is the case.

original: 'bras bu nyid ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang 'gal ba yin te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang 'gal ba yin te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The effect is incompatible with no link to another life.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu mtshan nub na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu mtshan nub na /
translated: Therefore, when the reason ceases,

original: rgyu mtshan can nad zhi ba bzhin du 'chi ba yin na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can nad zhi ba bzhin du 'chi ba yin na /
translated: like the pacification of a disease, death occurs.

original: rgyu sems med pa'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba med pa gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu sems med pa'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba med pa gsal ba yin no //
translated: Since the cause, the mind, does not exist, the link to another life is clearly not established.

original: 'chi ba yod na rgyu nub pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba la mtshams sbyor ba dang 'bras bu med par grub pa kho na dgra bcom pa'i ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'chi ba yod na rgyu nub pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba la mtshams sbyor ba dang 'bras bu med par grub pa kho na dgra bcom pa'i ma yin nam /
translated: If death exists, then the cause would cease, and it is established that there would be no connection and no effect.

original: de ltar 'gal ba yin /
analyzed: de ltar 'gal ba yin /
translated: This is the contradiction.

original: 'di la bstan pa /üîΩdgra bcom sems gang yin de yang //
analyzed: 'di la bstan pa / dgra bcom sems gang yin de yang //
translated: Here is the response:üîΩThe mind of an arhat

original: gang las mtshams sbyor med pa ste //
analyzed: gang las mtshams sbyor med pa ste //
translated: is not connected to anything.

original: mtshams sbyor dang bral ba yin par gang las te /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor dang bral ba yin par gang las te /
translated: From what is it free?

original: tshad ma gang las 'dod par te shes pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma gang las 'dod par te shes pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: From what is it not known?

original: de yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa lta bur mtshams sbyor ba can du tshad mas rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa lta bur mtshams sbyor ba can du tshad mas rtogs pa yin te /
translated: It is known by valid cognition that it is connected to something, like the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: sems la ni shin tu rnam par gcod par byed pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems la ni shin tu rnam par gcod par byed pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is not the slightest valid cognition that ascertains the mind of an arhat.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is nirvana,

original: ma yin te de ni zag pa dang bral ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te de ni zag pa dang bral ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
