analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú In that case, it is like the mind.‚Äù

original: gong ma la 'dzin pa'i bya ba yin pa phyi ma la rnam shes yin zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: gong ma la 'dzin pa'i bya ba yin pa phyi ma la rnam shes yin zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is that the former is the action of apprehending and the latter is consciousness.

original: lan 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni de 'gyur bas rnam par shes @224a * //üîΩpar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'o //üîΩlan gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa las kyang zhes bya ba 'di la snga ma'i gtan tshigs ni bskyar nas bshad pa ni grub mtha' la yin la /
analyzed: lan 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni de 'gyur bas rnam par shes @224a * // par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'o // lan gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa las kyang zhes bya ba 'di la snga ma'i gtan tshigs ni bskyar nas bshad pa ni grub mtha' la yin la /
translated: ‚Äú This is the answer‚Äù means that because of that change, there is consciousness.

original: tshang ba skyed byed nyid ma yin no /
analyzed: tshang ba skyed byed nyid ma yin no /
translated: ‚Äú Another answer‚Äù means that the former reason is repeated in the explanation of the collection, but it is not the producer of the complete effect.

original: shes pa de med pas de'i blo bzhin du 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa de med pas de'i blo bzhin du 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because that consciousness does not exist, it is like the mind, and the consequence that it is apprehended does not occur.

original: dbang po dang bcas pa las yin gyi rnam shes mi 'byung mi zin kyang /
analyzed: dbang po dang bcas pa las yin gyi rnam shes mi 'byung mi zin kyang /
translated: It is not that consciousness does not arise or is not apprehended from a sense faculty, but it does arise from a sense faculty.

original: dbang po med pa las ni 'gyur la /
analyzed: dbang po med pa las ni 'gyur la /
translated: It does not arise from a non-sense faculty.

original: de la ji skad bstan pa'i skyon yang med do //
analyzed: de la ji skad bstan pa'i skyon yang med do //
translated: And the error that has been explained does not occur.

original: shes pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu gzhan ma mthong ba yin na //üîΩde bzhin du 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang rgyu nyid dag tu sgro btags pas 'bras bu nyid dam /
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu gzhan ma mthong ba yin na // de bzhin du 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang rgyu nyid dag tu sgro btags pas 'bras bu nyid dam /
translated: Since we do not see any other effect that has the nature of consciousness,

original: rgyu nyid du srid pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu nyid du srid pa yin gyi /
translated: in the same way, it is possible that the nature of the effect and the cause are imputed to be the effect and the cause,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: but not otherwise.

original: thal 'gyur mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal 'gyur mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is illogical to go beyond that.

original: ji ltar mthong ba'i yid kyi rnam shes ni /
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba'i yid kyi rnam shes ni /
translated: The mental consciousness that sees

original: skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yin pa de yang de'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yin pa de yang de'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: is the effect of hair, nails, and so on, and it is also their cause.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu gzhan skyed par mi byed pas de kho na bskyed bya ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu gzhan skyed par mi byed pas de kho na bskyed bya ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: But it does not produce another effect that is similar to it. Therefore it is not that it is not the effect of those.

original: de lta yin na du ba yang me'i bskyed byar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na du ba yang me'i bskyed byar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, smoke would not be the effect of fire.

original: dbang rnams re re zhes bya bas bzlas pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang rnams re re zhes bya bas bzlas pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the faculties are not mentioned in the above verse,

original: des dbang po rnams kyi skyed byed nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: des dbang po rnams kyi skyed byed nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: because it refutes that they are creators.

original: sems med nyid phyir te phyi rol gyi 'byung ba bzhin du sems pa can dang lhan cig pa ma yin ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems med nyid phyir te phyi rol gyi 'byung ba bzhin du sems pa can dang lhan cig pa ma yin ba'i phyir /
translated: Because they are mindless, they are not like the external elements, which are concomitant with mind.

original: lhan cig pa yin pa'i nges pa yod na sems dang dbang po dag gi 'di dag la gang zhig gang gis 'bras bu yin par dpyod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: lhan cig pa yin pa'i nges pa yod na sems dang dbang po dag gi 'di dag la gang zhig gang gis 'bras bu yin par dpyod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were certain that they were concomitant, then it would be analyzed whether the mind or the faculties are the effect of the other.

original: shi ba'i lus la ni sems ldog pa na dbang po ldog pa bzhin du skra dang sen mo la sogs pa ldog pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: shi ba'i lus la ni sems ldog pa na dbang po ldog pa bzhin du skra dang sen mo la sogs pa ldog pa ni ma yin la /
translated: When the mind stops in a dead body, the faculties do not stop, like hair and nails and so on.

original: dbang po bzhin du 'di la yang nus pa dang / byin gyis rlob ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po bzhin du 'di la yang nus pa dang / byin gyis rlob ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, in this system, there is no classification of potency and blessing, as there is in the case of the faculties.

original: dbang po'i nus pa bzhin du de'i nus par rtog pa yang nus pa med pa'i phyir de rnams sems pa can dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sems nyid du grub po //
analyzed: dbang po'i nus pa bzhin du de'i nus par rtog pa yang nus pa med pa'i phyir de rnams sems pa can dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sems nyid du grub po //
translated: Because the conception of its potency is like the potency of the sense faculty, it is established that those are not the mind that has the characteristic of being simultaneous with the sentient being.

original: de dag gi lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i nges pa grub na rgyu mtshan ma med pas de la rag las pa'i 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par dpyad pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i nges pa grub na rgyu mtshan ma med pas de la rag las pa'i 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par dpyad pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is established that they are not simultaneous, then the analysis of the effect in terms of being dependent on the reason, etc., does not apply, because there is no reason.

original: 'grel bar yang /
analyzed: 'grel bar yang /
translated: And in the Commentary:

original: gang tshe skra dang sen mo sogs //
analyzed: gang tshe skra dang sen mo sogs //
translated: When hair, nails, and so on

original: sems ldan nyid ni ma @224b mthong ba //
analyzed: sems ldan nyid ni ma @224b mthong ba //
translated: Are not seen to be sentient,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and other passages,

original: don 'di nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: don 'di nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: this very point should be understood.

original: de dang 'brel pa nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa nyid yin na ni /
translated: If they were related,

original: de med par yid kyis shes par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dis lhan cig par med pa kho nar gsal bar byas pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de med par yid kyis shes par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dis lhan cig par med pa kho nar gsal bar byas pa yin zhing /
translated: then the mind would not cognize them in the absence of the body. This clearly shows that they are not simultaneous.

original: sems ldan nyid du zhes bya ba sems pa dang lhan cig pa'i 'bras bu nyid du sgro btags pa'i rgyu mtshan yang ngo //
analyzed: sems ldan nyid du zhes bya ba sems pa dang lhan cig pa'i 'bras bu nyid du sgro btags pa'i rgyu mtshan yang ngo //
translated: The reason for the superimposition of the effect of the mind is that it is the mind itself.

original: reg pa la sogs pa dang na reg pa'i dbang po la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: reg pa la sogs pa dang na reg pa'i dbang po la sogs pa dag go //
translated: Contact, etc., are the sense faculties, such as the eye faculty, etc.

original: ji ltar lhan cig gnas zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid med na lhan cig gnas pa'i nges pa med do /
analyzed: ji ltar lhan cig gnas zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid med na lhan cig gnas pa'i nges pa med do /
translated: How is it that they exist together? If there is no relation of cause and effect, there is no certainty that they exist together.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: dbang po'i nus pa dang lhan cig pa'i las dang / sems ji ltar lhan cig gnas pa nges pa yin /
analyzed: dbang po'i nus pa dang lhan cig pa'i las dang / sems ji ltar lhan cig gnas pa nges pa yin /
translated: How is it that the mind exists together with the karma that is the potentiality of the sense faculties?

original: nur nur po la sogs pa dbang po med pa la yang bdag go zhes bya ba'i yid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nur nur po la sogs pa dbang po med pa la yang bdag go zhes bya ba'i yid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The self is not the mind that exists in the absence of sense faculties, such as the kalala, etc.

original: de'i bskyed bya rnam shes kyi byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid kyi sa bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya rnam shes kyi byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid kyi sa bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the product of consciousness, it is the effect of consciousness.

original: rang rig pa'i bya ba'i rnam shes rnams ni bdag go zhes brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i bya ba'i rnam shes rnams ni bdag go zhes brjod pa yin te /
translated: The consciousness that is the object of the act of reflexive awareness is the self.

original: shes pa'i bdag la ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis te /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag la ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis te /
translated: The word ‚Äúthus‚Äù refers to the self of consciousness.

original: nges pa yang bdag nyid kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: nges pa yang bdag nyid kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: And because the self is not its own object,

original: dbang po dang dus mtshungs pa'i shes pa de yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po dang dus mtshungs pa'i shes pa de yang ma yin no //
translated: the consciousness that is simultaneous with the sense faculty is not it.

original: yid kyi rnam shes gzhan ni de sgrub par byed pa'i dus su yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes gzhan ni de sgrub par byed pa'i dus su yin no zhe na /
translated: But another mental consciousness is simultaneous with the sense faculty, and it is that which is the self.

original: de ni 'jig rten pha rol po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'jig rten pha rol po ma yin te /
translated: That is not so, because the self is not the world beyond.

original: nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i sems la de nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i sems la de nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mind that is associated with the pride of self is accepted as the self in this world.

original: 'on te yid kyi rnam shes gzhan kho na yid kyi rgyal srid la sogs pa bzhin du goms pa las byung ba dbang po dang dus mtshungs pa'i phyir rang rig pa'i bya ba las /
analyzed: 'on te yid kyi rnam shes gzhan kho na yid kyi rgyal srid la sogs pa bzhin du goms pa las byung ba dbang po dang dus mtshungs pa'i phyir rang rig pa'i bya ba las /
translated: But another mental consciousness, like the sovereignty of the mind, etc., arises from habit. It is simultaneous with the sense faculty. It is the self that is aware of itself.

original: nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang 'jig rten pha rol po yin no de lta na de ni dbang po'i nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang 'jig rten pha rol po yin no de lta na de ni dbang po'i nges pa ma yin te /
translated: The self is the world beyond, because it is associated with pride.

original: de las ma byung ba'i phyir skad cig ma ma yin pa yin no //
analyzed: de las ma byung ba'i phyir skad cig ma ma yin pa yin no //
translated: But that is not the sense faculty, because it does not arise from it. It is not momentary.

original: lhan cig pa yin na ni nges pa can yin te dbang po med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig pa yin na ni nges pa can yin te dbang po med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were simultaneous, it would definitely be so, because it would not occur without the sense faculty.

original: de'i phyir de las byung ba nyid ni khyab byed yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de las byung ba nyid ni khyab byed yin la /
translated: Therefore it is reasonable to say that arising from that is the pervader,

original: khyab bya las de dang lhan cig pa nyid du nges pa rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyab bya las de dang lhan cig pa nyid du nges pa rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: and that the pervaded is ascertained to be simultaneous with that.

original: de blo bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa yin zhes de'i 'bras bu thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur bar bya ba ma yin la /üîΩde'i bu yin pas sdo @225a * //
analyzed: de blo bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa yin zhes de'i 'bras bu thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur bar bya ba ma yin la / de'i bu yin pas sdo @225a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúlike the mind‚Äù indicates that it is uncertain that all results of that are just like that.

original: bsangs kho nar nges par 'gyur bar bya ba ma yin te /üîΩ'di la yang mtshungs pa yin par mthong ba ni gnod pa can yin no snyam du sems pa la mthong ba gzhan du grub pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsangs kho nar nges par 'gyur bar bya ba ma yin te / 'di la yang mtshungs pa yin par mthong ba ni gnod pa can yin no snyam du sems pa la mthong ba gzhan du grub pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: And because he is his son, it is not certain that he is just like his father.üîΩHere, the opponent thinks that the example is similar, but it is invalidated.üîΩThe response is that the establishment of the example is different.

original: lhan cig gnas par nges par byed pa nus ba las kyi ming can gyis rgyu tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas par nges par byed pa nus ba las kyi ming can gyis rgyu tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause the cause is not different‚Äù means that the cause of the eye consciousness is not different from the cause of the eye faculty.

original: dbang po la srid pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi dbang po 'phangs pas de'am /üîΩbdag gi yang rten nyid kyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam shes gzhan ni bdag go zhes bya ba kho nas dbang po'i shes pas rjes su byed pas 'phangs pa yin la dbang po'i shes pa yang goms pa'i bskyed bya nyid kyis yid gzhan bzhin duüîΩbdag gi blo 'jig rten pha rol po nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir dang / goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang po la srid pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi dbang po 'phangs pas de'am / bdag gi yang rten nyid kyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam shes gzhan ni bdag go zhes bya ba kho nas dbang po'i shes pas rjes su byed pas 'phangs pa yin la dbang po'i shes pa yang goms pa'i bskyed bya nyid kyis yid gzhan bzhin du bdag gi blo 'jig rten pha rol po nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir dang / goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The other mental consciousness that is the support of the faculties, which is accompanied by the pride of thinking ‚ÄúI am,‚Äù is projected by the faculty consciousness, because it is the product of the faculty consciousness.

original: lhan cig gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pa yin te /
translated: The faculty consciousness is also the support of the mental consciousness, because the mind is not different from the world beyond, and because it is the product of habituation, just like the other mental consciousnesses.

original: lus kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir ram rgyu tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir ram rgyu tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mental consciousness is the support of the body, because it is the product of the body, or because it is not a different cause.

original: de'i phyir the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore there is no doubt.

original: yang na lus dang yid kyi rnam shes dag nges par lhan cig par dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: yang na lus dang yid kyi rnam shes dag nges par lhan cig par dmigs pa ni /
translated: Or else, the body and the mental consciousness are definitely observed simultaneously.

original: de lta bu'i tshogs pas 'phangs pa yin gyi phan tshun 'bras bu nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshogs pas 'phangs pa yin gyi phan tshun 'bras bu nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Such a collection projects the effect, but the collection is not the effect of each other.

original: de lta bu kho nar 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs su mthong ba'i phyir dang / ji lta ba ma yin pa'i rtog pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu kho nar 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs su mthong ba'i phyir dang / ji lta ba ma yin pa'i rtog pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen that way in the present life, and because it is illogical to imagine that it is not that way.

original: de'i phyir dus kun du rgyu mthong ba nyid yin zhes brjod pas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus kun du rgyu mthong ba nyid yin zhes brjod pas so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the cause is always seen.

original: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kyis lhan cig pa'i yul phyi rol lam /
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kyis lhan cig pa'i yul phyi rol lam /
translated: The external object that is the domain of the collection is either simultaneous or sequential.

original: cig shos kyi dbye bas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: cig shos kyi dbye bas bstan pa ni /
translated: The other is taught by the distinction of the other.

original: dbang po bzhin du gzungs dang ro bzhin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po bzhin du gzungs dang ro bzhin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Like the sense faculties, like the memory of taste.

original: dbang rnams re re la gnod kyang zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: dbang rnams re re la gnod kyang zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: If each sense faculty is impaired,

original: dbang po'i rnam par 'gyur ba las kyang yid kyi rnam shes 'gyur ba yin no zhes rgol ba las /
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par 'gyur ba las kyang yid kyi rnam shes 'gyur ba yin no zhes rgol ba las /
translated: the mental consciousness changes from the change of the sense faculty.

original: de'i lan ni bsgyur bya nyid gang yin pa de 'bras bu yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'gyur ba las yid kyi rnam shes dbang po bzhin du bsgyur bya kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i lan ni bsgyur bya nyid gang yin pa de 'bras bu yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'gyur ba las yid kyi rnam shes dbang po bzhin du bsgyur bya kho na ma yin te /
translated: The response is that the object of transformation is the result, but mental consciousness is not merely the object of transformation like the sense faculty, due to the transformation of the sense faculty.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba nges pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid du bstan nas /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba nges pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid du bstan nas /
translated: Since the transformation is not definite, it is taught that it is not the result.

original: da ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi 'gyur ba nyid ni dbang pos byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: da ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi 'gyur ba nyid ni dbang pos byas pa ma yin te /
translated: Now, the transformation of mental consciousness is not created by the sense faculty.

original: dmigs par byas pa nyid kyis gzhan du grub pa'i phyir ro zhes phyogs snga phyi dbye ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs par byas pa nyid kyis gzhan du grub pa'i phyir ro zhes phyogs snga phyi dbye ba bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is established as different by the mere act of being observed, the former and latter positions are distinguished and taught.

original: de 'gyur @225b na 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni lus la brten pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de 'gyur @225b na 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni lus la brten pa ma yin la /
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúBecause it transforms,‚Äù because afflicted mental consciousness is not supported on the body.

original: de'i phyir de'i rten ni gzhan yin par brtag par bya ba yin te /üîΩ'di ni / gang zhig yod pas phan 'dogs byed //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rten ni gzhan yin par brtag par bya ba yin te / 'di ni / gang zhig yod pas phan 'dogs byed //
translated: Therefore its support should be considered to be different.

original: ces 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is explained in the line, ‚ÄúThat which exists is beneficial.‚Äù

original: gal te yang phyi rol ni don byed pa yin la dmigs pa med pa'i yid kyang phyi rol de dang nang du de dmigs pa ni rnams par 'gyur bar byed par dmigs pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gal te yang phyi rol ni don byed pa yin la dmigs pa med pa'i yid kyang phyi rol de dang nang du de dmigs pa ni rnams par 'gyur bar byed par dmigs pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: But if you think that external objects are functional and the mind that lacks an object is not an object of external objects, then internal objects are not objects of external objects.

original: snga phyi zhes bya ba ste sgro btags pa tsam ste /
analyzed: snga phyi zhes bya ba ste sgro btags pa tsam ste /
translated: The statement ‚Äúprior and subsequent‚Äù is mere imputation.

original: sgro btags pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bya ba tsam yin par zad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sgro btags pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bya ba tsam yin par zad pa yin gyi /
translated: It is merely the activity of the conception of imputation.

original: nang dang phyi rol las gzhan pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol las gzhan pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: There is nothing other than internal and external objects.

original: de yang mi snang ba yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa yin zhing mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes ni dbang po'i rnam pa'i lus la brten pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang mi snang ba yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa yin zhing mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes ni dbang po'i rnam pa'i lus la brten pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And since that is not apparent, it is not an object. Eye consciousness and so on are not supported by the body that is the form of the sense faculty.

original: de bstan pa ni rten med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni rten med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by the words ‚Äúwithout support.‚ÄùüîΩWhat contradiction is there in the final mind

original: tha ma'i sems ni sems gzhan dang // mtshams sbyor ba la 'gal ci yod //
analyzed: tha ma'i sems ni sems gzhan dang // mtshams sbyor ba la 'gal ci yod //
translated: and another mind connecting?

original: ces bya bas 'chi ba ni nad dang dug dang mtshon la sogs pa las gal te yang sems dngos su gcod par byed pa nyid bkag pa yin na de lta na yang lus ldog pas de yang ldog pa dang / lus rnam par 'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba yang ma yin nam /
analyzed: ces bya bas 'chi ba ni nad dang dug dang mtshon la sogs pa las gal te yang sems dngos su gcod par byed pa nyid bkag pa yin na de lta na yang lus ldog pas de yang ldog pa dang / lus rnam par 'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba yang ma yin nam /
translated: If you think that death is not the cessation of the mind due to the direct harm of disease, poison, weapons, etc., then it is the cessation of the body, and thus it is the cessation of the mind, and it is the transformation of the body, and thus it is the transformation of the mind.

original: dbang rnams re re la gnod kyang zhes bya ba 'dis kyang dbang po rnam par 'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba nyid bsal ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dbang rnams re re la gnod kyang zhes bya ba 'dis kyang dbang po rnam par 'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba nyid bsal ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: And if you think that the harm of each of the sense faculties also eliminates the transformation of the mind due to the transformation of the sense faculties,

original: don gyi sgo nas te yul gyi sgo nas dug dang mtshon la sogs pas ni /üîΩlus ldog pa'i sgo nas sems ldog par byed pa'am /
analyzed: don gyi sgo nas te yul gyi sgo nas dug dang mtshon la sogs pas ni / lus ldog pa'i sgo nas sems ldog par byed pa'am /
translated: then, from the perspective of the object,üîΩthe mind is not ceased due to the cessation of the body

original: de rnam par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnam par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: or transformed due to the transformation of the body.

original: 'on kyang gdungs par byed pa nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: 'on kyang gdungs par byed pa nyid kyis sam /
translated: However, it is ceased due to the harm of the object,

original: gzhan du yang dmigs par byed na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yang dmigs par byed na'o //
translated: or it is transformed due to the transformation of the object.

original: 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa bzhin du lus la yang rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa bzhin du lus la yang rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Just as the body is transformed when a wish is fulfilled, so too is the mind.

original: yod du chug kyang des sems rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yod du chug kyang des sems rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Even if it did exist, it would not transform the mind,

original: de med kyang dmigs pa las rnam par 'gyur ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang dmigs pa las rnam par 'gyur ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mind is established as transforming from its object even when the body does not exist.

original: gzhan gyi las tshogs kyis kyang /
analyzed: gzhan gyi las tshogs kyis kyang /
translated: Also, the body is seen to transform due to the karma of others.

original: de'i byas pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba mthong bas de la dmigs pa'i phyir dang / de nyid la mtshams sbyor bar cis mi byed pa yin zhe na /üîΩtshe zad pa la gnas @226a * //
analyzed: de'i byas pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba mthong bas de la dmigs pa'i phyir dang / de nyid la mtshams sbyor bar cis mi byed pa yin zhe na / tshe zad pa la gnas @226a * //
translated: Why does it not connect with that body alone, since it observes that body?

original: pa'i 'phen byed med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i 'phen byed med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no projecting force for it to remain when its life span is exhausted.

original: yod kyang dug la sogs pa'i gnod pas lus la rang gi rnam shes med pas /
analyzed: yod kyang dug la sogs pa'i gnod pas lus la rang gi rnam shes med pas /
translated: Even if it did exist, the body would not benefit the mind, because the mind does not exist in the body when it is harmed by poison and so on.

original: de phan mi thogs pa'i phyir /üîΩde yi shes pas phan 'dogs phyir //üîΩyid kyi lus la brten par bshad //
analyzed: de phan mi thogs pa'i phyir / de yi shes pas phan 'dogs phyir // yid kyi lus la brten par bshad //
translated: Because it benefits the mind,

original: ces gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is explained that it is supported by the mental body.

original: sa bon las byung ba'i 'bru yang char la sogs pas phan ma btags pas na phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: sa bon las byung ba'i 'bru yang char la sogs pas phan ma btags pas na phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur la /
translated: Also, grains that arise from seeds do not become perfect without the benefit of rain and so on.üîΩAnd also,

original: phan 'dogs byed pa'ang yin bla ste //
analyzed: phan 'dogs byed pa'ang yin bla ste //
translated: the benefit is not from that alone.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is because

original: dngos su rten yin pa nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: dngos su rten yin pa nyid kyis sam /
translated: it is the actual support,

original: ma yin yang zlos pa ma yin la /üîΩlus la sred pa dang bcas pa'i yid dam /
analyzed: ma yin yang zlos pa ma yin la / lus la sred pa dang bcas pa'i yid dam /
translated: but even if it is not, it is not redundant.

original: las kyang des phan 'dogs par mi byed na mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la dgongs pa ni /
analyzed: las kyang des phan 'dogs par mi byed na mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la dgongs pa ni /
translated: Also, the mind that possesses craving for the body or karma do not benefit it.üîΩThe intention here is that since craving for that leads to rebirth there, it is not dependent on not benefiting it, and the support that is that or not that is generated by the object of familiarity with its type because it is seen in the first moment of birth and so on.

original: de la sred pas der 'dren pa'i phyir dang / phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la yang mi ltos pa'i phyir dang / de dang de ma yin pa'i rten nyid kyang rang gi rigs goms pa'i bskyed bya yin par skye ba'i dang po la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir de ldog pa yin yang mi ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sred pas der 'dren pa'i phyir dang / phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la yang mi ltos pa'i phyir dang / de dang de ma yin pa'i rten nyid kyang rang gi rigs goms pa'i bskyed bya yin par skye ba'i dang po la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir de ldog pa yin yang mi ldog pa yin no //
translated: Since it is understood that it is like this, it is not the case that it does not cease even though it ceases.

original: yang na don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang na don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba ste /
translated: Or else, artha means that which is sought,üîΩthat which is to be taken up or rejected, namely, pleasure and pain and the means of attaining them.üîΩAnd that is accomplished by this,üîΩthe meaning is that it is accomplished by means of this.

original: blang bya'am dor bya ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang de'i sgrub byed rnams yin la /
analyzed: blang bya'am dor bya ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang de'i sgrub byed rnams yin la /
translated: And that is the object of perception, since it is the object of perception.

original: de yang 'di'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: de yang 'di'i sgo nas te /
translated: And that is also indirectly indicated.üîΩThe meaning is that it is indirectly indicated.

original: de'i shes pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / shes pa dang shes pa ma yin pa dag gi dbye ba la yang dgongs pa 'di yin no //üîΩlus rnam par 'gyur ba yin na sems rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gyur ba can gyi sems ni sems kho na las skyes par mi rigs pa ma yin nam sems ni lus dang bral bar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i shes pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / shes pa dang shes pa ma yin pa dag gi dbye ba la yang dgongs pa 'di yin no //üîΩlus rnam par 'gyur ba yin na sems rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gyur ba can gyi sems ni sems kho na las skyes par mi rigs pa ma yin nam sems ni lus dang bral bar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is that it is indirectly indicated.üîΩThe

original: de'i phyir lus kho na las skyes pa'i sems ni sems 'gyur bas 'gyur ba can du 'gyur snyam du sems pa las ;
analyzed: de'i phyir lus kho na las skyes pa'i sems ni sems 'gyur bas 'gyur ba can du 'gyur snyam du sems pa las ;
translated: Therefore, the mind that arises from the body alone is transformed by the transformation of the mind.

original: lus yod ba ni rtag tu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lus yod ba ni rtag tu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú If the body exists‚Äù means that it is always.

original: gal te yang lus ni sems dang mi 'bral bar mthong ba de lta na yang sems kyi snga rol tu med par mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te yang lus ni sems dang mi 'bral bar mthong ba de lta na yang sems kyi snga rol tu med par mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even if the body is seen to be not separate from the mind, it is not established that it does not exist prior to the mind.

original: de ltar na ma grub pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na ma grub pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Thus, it is shown that it is not established:

original: rig pa rang ngam zhes bya ba bdag nyid kyis skye bzhin @226b par rig pas sam gzhan gyis te sems kyis sam skyes bus so //
analyzed: rig pa rang ngam zhes bya ba bdag nyid kyis skye bzhin @226b par rig pas sam gzhan gyis te sems kyis sam skyes bus so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe body is not known by itself‚Äù means that it is not known by itself, or by another, by the mind, or by a person.

original: re zhig 'bras bu'i shes pas ma yin te rang gi dus 'dzin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: re zhig 'bras bu'i shes pas ma yin te rang gi dus 'dzin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not by the consciousness of the effect, because it is grasped at its own time.

original: snga rol du byung ba'i 'bras bu 'am rgyu 'am gzhan yang rung ba rigs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga rol du byung ba'i 'bras bu 'am rgyu 'am gzhan yang rung ba rigs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not tenable that an effect, a cause, or another exists prior to it.

original: mig la sogs pa bya ba'i dus su de'i shes pa rnams med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa bya ba'i dus su de'i shes pa rnams med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the consciousnesses of the eye and so on do not exist at the time of the action.

original: de rgyu nyid du ji ltar rtogs pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de rgyu nyid du ji ltar rtogs pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: How is it understood that that is the cause?

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe eye consciousnesses, etc.‚Äù

original: lan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lan ni ma yin te /
translated: The answer is:

original: de dag la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe presence and absence of the eye, etc.,‚Äù

original: mig la sogs pa bya ba'i dus kho na'i tshe shes pa gzhan rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par 'dzin par byed pa yod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa bya ba'i dus kho na'i tshe shes pa gzhan rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par 'dzin par byed pa yod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that at the time of the activity of the eye, etc., there is a presence and absence of the apprehension of the presence and absence of another consciousness.

original: de 'di nyid nyams su myong bar 'dzin pas sgrub par byed pa ni mig phye ba nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de 'di nyid nyams su myong bar 'dzin pas sgrub par byed pa ni mig phye ba nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The proof of this is the experience of this itself, which is stated in the words ‚Äúwhen the eye is open.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du skye ba'i dang por 'byung pa'i lus ni lus kyi shes pa skye pa'i snga rol du shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba'i dang por 'byung pa'i lus ni lus kyi shes pa skye pa'i snga rol du shes pa ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, the body that occurs at the beginning of birth is not a consciousness prior to the arising of the body consciousness,

original: shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyod du zin kyang de las skye ba'i phyir lus bsgyur mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa med pa'i phyir ro // yod du zin kyang de las skye ba'i phyir lus bsgyur mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: because it is not a consciousness.

original: skye ba'i dang po'i phyogs pa'i lus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i dang po'i phyogs pa'i lus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even if it were, it would not change into a body, because it would arise from that. This is demonstrated in the words ‚Äúthe body that occurs at the beginning of birth.‚Äù

original: mig la sogs pa bzhin du shes pa la lus kyang rgyu yin par shes pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni ;
analyzed: mig la sogs pa bzhin du shes pa la lus kyang rgyu yin par shes pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni ;
translated: But is it not understood by another cognition that the body is a cause of cognition, just like the eyes and so on?

original: gal te gzhan gyis rtogs she na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyis rtogs she na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is understood by another,

original: lan ni snga na med pa ga las rtogs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni snga na med pa ga las rtogs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then how is it understood that it does not exist previously?

original: mig la sogs pa bya ba'i dus su ni /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa bya ba'i dus su ni /
translated: At the time of the activity of the eyes and so on,

original: de'i bya ba 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gzhan rang gi rig bya ni de shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir de med par tha snyad byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i bya ba 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gzhan rang gi rig bya ni de shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir de med par tha snyad byed pa yin gyi /
translated: the cognition that apprehends their activity is different from the cognition that apprehends the object of those eyes and so on, because the object of those eyes and so on is devoid of cognition. Therefore, it is conventionally said that it does not exist.

original: de bzhin du lus kyi bya ba 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzhan ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi bya ba 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzhan ni /
translated: In the same way, the cognition that apprehends the activity of the body

original: de shes pa med pa'i 'dzin pa po yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de shes pa med pa'i 'dzin pa po yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: is not the apprehender that is devoid of the cognition of that body.

original: yod pa yin na yang de kho na las de skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yod pa yin na yang de kho na las de skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Even if it did exist, it would arise from that alone.

original: ma mthong ba tsam ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The mere non-seeing is the cause of doubt. This is the meaning.

original: 'on te dus phyis 'byung ba'i shes pa ni sngar shes pa ni sngar shes pa med par rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te dus phyis 'byung ba'i shes pa ni sngar shes pa ni sngar shes pa med par rtogs pa yin la /
translated: Or, the later consciousness realizes that the former consciousness does not exist.

original: de yang rang gi dus kyi shes pa med par rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang rang gi dus kyi shes pa med par rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: And that also realizes that the consciousness of its own time does not exist.

original: sngar shes pa med pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sngar shes pa med pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: But it is not taught that the former consciousness does not exist.

original: ltar rung ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltar rung ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not tenable‚Äù is stated.

original: 'di la dper bya ba ni gnyid log pa la 'ang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di la dper bya ba ni gnyid log pa la 'ang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is like this‚Äù is the example.

original: ji lta ba kho na'i gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs kyi shes pa ni @227a * //
analyzed: ji lta ba kho na'i gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs kyi shes pa ni @227a * //
translated: The consciousness of the state of sleep, just as it is,

original: dmigs pa med pa kho na yin yang dus phyis sad pa yin gyi de dag tsam gyis med par nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa kho na yin yang dus phyis sad pa yin gyi de dag tsam gyis med par nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: is indeed without an object, but later, when one awakens, it is not ascertained that they do not exist.

original: lus skye ba'i dus na sems kyang yod na rang rig par 'gyur la /
analyzed: lus skye ba'i dus na sems kyang yod na rang rig par 'gyur la /
translated: If the mind exists at the time the body is born, it would be reflexive awareness,

original: dus phyis kyang dran par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: dus phyis kyang dran par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: and later it would be remembered.

original: 'on te gal te zhes bya ba ste /üîΩ'di la dper byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te gal te zhes bya ba ste / 'di la dper byed pa ni /
translated: Thinking this, he says, ‚ÄúOr, if you think that . . .

original: gang phyir sang pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang phyir sang pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äù The example here is ‚Äúbecause of the dream . . .üîΩ‚Äù

original: lan ni rtog pa med pa yin nam ci zhes bya ba ste lus skye ba'i dus na sems nyams su myong ba med pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: lan ni rtog pa med pa yin nam ci zhes bya ba ste lus skye ba'i dus na sems nyams su myong ba med pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin par ni mi rigs te /
translated: The answer is, ‚ÄúIs it not a thought?‚Äù When the body is born, it is not reasonable that it be the object of the convention ‚Äúnonexistent,‚Äù since it is not an experience of the mind.

original: nyams su myong ba yod kyang dran pa med pas nyams su myong ba med par mngon par sems ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba yod kyang dran pa med pas nyams su myong ba med par mngon par sems ba'i phyir te /
translated: Even though there is an experience, it is not remembered, and so it is as if there were no experience.

original: rmi lam du yang sad pa'i tshe nyams su myong ba bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rmi lam du yang sad pa'i tshe nyams su myong ba bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is like the experience at the time of waking from sleep.

original: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The second half is explained as follows.

original: rmi lam gyi rig pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi rig pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The awareness of a dream is not the awareness of the dream itself.

original: gal te sad pa'i shes pa bskyed bya nyid kyis gnyid log pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te sad pa'i shes pa bskyed bya nyid kyis gnyid log pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ma yin na /
translated: If the awareness of being awake is not the awareness of the awareness of sleep because it is the effect of the awareness of being awake,

original: de kho na las de yin zhes ci las shes she na /
analyzed: de kho na las de yin zhes ci las shes she na /
translated: how do you know that it is just that?

original: de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that it is because the difference in the effect is seen:

original: de lta na yang de lta bu nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang de lta bu nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven so, it is just that.‚Äù

original: de la de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par nyid rtogs pa'i phyir de'i bskyed bya nyid du mi rtogs pa ma yin nam /üîΩ'on kyang sad pa'i gnas skabs na de'i bskyed bya nyid rtogs pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa ni /

original: 'on te sad na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te sad na zhes bya ba ste /

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni skye ba snga ma'i shes pa las skye ba 'di la sogs pa'i shes pa yod pa la'o //

analyzed: rgyu gzhan du thal ba zhes bya ba ni don gzhan rtogs par bya ba la 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba dang 'gal ba yin no //

analyzed: gang gi phyir mtha' rgyu tshogs pa ni 'bras bu skye ba ni gzhan la mi ltos par lan cig mthong ba las rtogs pa yin la /
translated: Because the final collection of causes is seen once as the arising of the effect, which does not depend on another.üîΩIf the effect does not arise even though it exists, it would be dependent.

original: de yod kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung na ltos pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis ltos pa med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de yod kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung na ltos pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis ltos pa med pa nyid de /

analyzed: tshang pa dang ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid de / ma tshang ba 'gal ba yin la /

analyzed: des khyab pa'i res 'ga' ba'i mi 'byung ba dang yang 'gal ba'i phyir /

analyzed: khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin na ni rgyu nus pa can ni 'bras bu la ma 'khrul ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the pervader is contradictory, then the cause is not in error with regard to the effect.

original: de lta na 'o na rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi zhes bya ba 'di la nus ba'i khyad par rjes su 'jug pa la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi zhes bya ba 'di la nus ba'i khyad par rjes su 'jug pa la ltos pa yin no //
translated: If that is so, then this ‚Äúcause‚Äù is dependent on the special potency that is the consequence.

original: nus pa can gyi rgyu mthong na 'bras bu la mi 'khrul pa dran pa'i dus kho na la bar du gcod pa med pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /

translated: When one sees a cause that has potency, is it not the case that the effect is directly perceived at the very time of the memory that is not in error with regard to the effect, provided that there is no obstruction?

original: rjes su dpag pas ci dgos /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ci dgos /

original: gang du 'bras bu dbang po las 'das pa yin pa de la rjes su dpag pa don med pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du 'bras bu dbang po las 'das pa yin pa de la rjes su dpag pa don med pa can ma yin no //

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu kho na yin zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i skyon kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu kho na yin zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i skyon kho na yin no //

original: rgyu tshogs pa yang bar du chod pa srid pa'i phyir 'bras bu la nges pa'i rtags ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa yang bar du chod pa srid pa'i phyir 'bras bu la nges pa'i rtags ma yin nam /
translated: And is not the collection of causes a sign of the effect, since it is possible that there is an obstruction?

original: de lta mod kyi 'bras bur rung ba nyid du nges pa la yin gyi 'bras bu ma nges pas rung ba nyid du nges pa las rjes su dpog pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'bras bur rung ba nyid du nges pa la yin gyi 'bras bu ma nges pas rung ba nyid du nges pa las rjes su dpog pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that the existence of the effect is inferred from the existence of the suitability of the effect, because the effect is not ascertained.

original: rung ba nyid du nges pa ma yin pas zlog par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rung ba nyid du nges pa ma yin pas zlog par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If the effect is not ascertained, then the existence of the effect is not inferred from the existence of the suitability of the effect, because the existence of the effect is not ascertained.

original: 'on te 'bras bu la the tshom za bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'bras bu la the tshom za bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if the effect is doubted, then the existence of the effect is inferred from the existence of the suitability of the effect.üîΩThe response is: ‚ÄúNo, it is from the suitability of the effect that is yet to arise.‚Äù

original: de rig pa po'i mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rig pa po'i mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: de rig pa ma yin pa yang 'brel pa ma bzung ba'i rjes su dpag pa mi skye pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rig pa ma yin pa yang 'brel pa ma bzung ba'i rjes su dpag pa mi skye pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i rung ba nyid kyang de ma nges na mi nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i rung ba nyid kyang de ma nges na mi nges pa yin no //

original: 'dis ni rung ba nyid kyi spyi bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rung ba nyid kyi spyi bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the general rule of possibility.üîΩAnd the certainty of impossibility is also seen only through perception, because the possibility of an effect is established.

original: rung ba nyid ma yin pa'i nges pa yang mngon sum kho na las mthong ba'i 'bras bu'i rung ba nyid grub pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la nges pa med na /
analyzed: rung ba nyid ma yin pa'i nges pa yang mngon sum kho na las mthong ba'i 'bras bu'i rung ba nyid grub pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la nges pa med na /
translated: If there is no certainty regarding a future effect,

original: rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma mthong ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma mthong ste /

analyzed: nges pa can gyi rung ba nyid ni res 'ga' nges pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te yang yul dang dus la sogs pa'i khyad par med par med pas 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin yang /

analyzed: rjes su dpag ma ni de'i khyad par gyis mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin na /

original: 'on ci zhe zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci zhe zhe na /

original: tshogs pa yin la /
analyzed: tshogs pa yin la /

original: de yang ltos pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang ltos pa med pa yin te /

original: 'bras bu med na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu med na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de lta yin na de rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa ni /

analyzed: don gzhan rtogs par bya ba la 'bras bu kho na zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba yin no //

original: 'di la bshad pa ni /

original: mthong ba yin gyi de dag min //

original: gal te yang de las 'byung rngub byed ces bya ba 'di nyid kyis gtan tshigs dag tu nges sbyar ba yin yang ldog pa med pa thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la'ang rtogs pa'i phyir sbyar bar bya ba dag kho na yin te /

analyzed: gzhan du ni ma 'grub pa'i phyir de la gnas pa dag 'di la dbang byed pa kho na yin par rigs so //

original: de bzhin du 'byung ba tsam ma med @235a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'byung ba tsam ma med @235a * //
translated: In the same way, the mere elements are not the cause of the eye, etc.,

original: yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par yang lus tsam ma dbugs la sogs pa'i khyad par yang sems kyi rten nyid yin la bkag pa na gnas pa'i rlung ngam de'i khyad par can gyi lus de ci las thob pa yin de'i phyir ldog pa'i don du 'byin pa dangüîΩ'dren pa zhes bya ba nye bar sbyor bar mi rigs so ;

translated: When it is stopped, the body is obtained from the vƒÅyu that is the basis of the body or a special body. Therefore it is not correct to apply the terms ‚Äúexhalation‚Äù and ‚Äúinhalation‚Äù for the purpose of reversal.

analyzed: / de'i phyir dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa ni sems kyi bskyed bya nyid du bsgrubs nas de las de ma yin zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba la gnas skabs kyi gtan tshigs las bzlog pa gtan tshigs ma yin pa dang de med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir dang

original: de rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the latter is not the cause.üîΩIf the exhalation, etc., of the breath is the result, then it is imputed as the cause of that and something else.

original: dbugs 'bung ba la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid la de dang de las gzhan pa'i rgyus sgro btags pa yin no zhe na yang 'di la yang sems la sems gzhan gyi rgyu yin na 'bras bu la dbugs pa la sogs par 'du byed par sgro btags pa yin
analyzed: dbugs 'bung ba la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid la de dang de las gzhan pa'i rgyus sgro btags pa yin no zhe na yang 'di la yang sems la sems gzhan gyi rgyu yin na 'bras bu la dbugs pa la sogs par 'du byed par sgro btags pa yin
translated: But in this case, if the mind is the cause of another mind, then the exhalation, etc., of the breath is imputed as the modification of the result.

analyzed: la de na de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs las bzlog pa yin pa dang de med kyang 'byung par ma grub pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /

analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i sems kyi bskyed bya'i khyad par ji lta bu'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de lta bu'i sems kyi bskyed bya'i khyad par ni ma yin te /

original: rang gi rigs goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rlung 'byin pa dang 'dren pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi rigs goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rlung 'byin pa dang 'dren pa ni zhes bya ba ste /

original: de'i ngo bo yang sems kyi bskyed bya nyid du nges par gzung ba yin pa'i phyir rmi lam la sogs pa na de med kyang de'i 'du byed pa las der nges pa yin no zhes bya bar yang ma grub po //

translated: The nature of that is ascertained as the special effect of the mind, because even when that does not exist in dreams, etc., it is ascertained as that due to the formative forces of that.

original: ji ltar yang sems phul du byung ba dang 'grib pa yin na /
analyzed: ji ltar yang sems phul du byung ba dang 'grib pa yin na /

analyzed: de dag gi @235b phul byung 'grib pa thob par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du de dag gi phul du byung ba dang 'grib pa yin na sems ni de 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin no //

translated: If it does not exist, then even though there is the occurrence of inhalation, etc., it is to be supplied that ‚Äúfrom what is there the occurrence of inhalation, etc.?‚Äù The nature of what is produced by mind is not obtained, even though there is the occurrence of inhalation, etc.

analyzed: 'du byed pa'i sgo nas de'i gnas skabs na yang de nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don te //

analyzed: de'i phyir sems kyi bskyed bya dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa bzhin du sems ni de dag gi bskyed bya yin par rtogs pa ma yin ste /

analyzed: de'i bskyed bya ma yin pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de'i phyir de de las ma yi par dam bcas pa grub pa yin no //

original: de'i skyed byed med na gang las 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i skyed byed med na gang las 'byung ste /

analyzed: de'i bskyed byar gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de de las ma yin zhes bya bar grub po //

analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa na de med pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la de la yang sems kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par du mthong ba'i phyir de rjes su dpag pa ni rang gi ngo bo med kyang du byed pa'i sgo nas yod par shes pa yin

analyzed: de'i bskyed bya nyid kyi khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //

translated: Since the mere performance of generosity and so on does not fulfill one‚Äôs desire, the essence of one‚Äôs desire is the performance of the cause of generosity and so on.

analyzed: de'i tshe yang ji ltar 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, how does one fulfill one‚Äôs desire?

original: bsnyen bkur dang 'dod pa la sogs pa lta bu yin par brjod de bsnyen bkur la sogs pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsnyen bkur dang 'dod pa la sogs pa lta bu yin par brjod de bsnyen bkur la sogs pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub pa ma yin te /
translated: It is said that one fulfills one‚Äôs desire through service, objects of desire, and so on, but the result is not accomplished by service and so on alone.

original: da ltar ba'i mngon par 'dod pa ni 'di'i 'phen byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar ba'i mngon par 'dod pa ni 'di'i 'phen byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because present desire is not the projecting cause of that result.

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar rang gi rigs las skyes pa'i sems mngon par 'dod pa'i snying po can gnas pa ni des drangs pa'i skyon mnyam pa'i rgyu mtshan tsam yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar rang gi rigs las skyes pa'i sems mngon par 'dod pa'i snying po can gnas pa ni des drangs pa'i skyon mnyam pa'i rgyu mtshan tsam yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the essence of one‚Äôs desire is the abiding of the mind that is born from one‚Äôs own type, which is merely the cause of the same fault that is induced by that.

original: gzhan du na de dag gi rims la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa dang med pa go bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de dag gi rims la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa dang med pa go bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, the existence and non-existence of the transformation of those would be the objects of understanding.

original: sems yod pa dang med pa dag kyang ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pas gzhan du yang grub pa yin te go byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems yod pa dang med pa dag kyang ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pas gzhan du yang grub pa yin te go byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The existence and non-existence of mind are also established elsewhere by the reasoning that has been taught, because they are not the objects of understanding.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba med na gang la yang mi mthun pa med pas mnyam pa'i de'i bskyed bya sems gnas pa yin pa bzlog par sus nus par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba med na gang la yang mi mthun pa med pas mnyam pa'i de'i bskyed bya sems gnas pa yin pa bzlog par sus nus par 'gyur te /
translated: If there is no transformation, then since there is no disagreement with anything, who could stop the production of the mind that is the product of that sameness?

original: rnam par 'gyur ba phra mo yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba phra mo yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: There is also no subtle transformation.

original: de rtogs pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition that comprehends that.

original: lan cig rjes su dpag pa'i mi mthun pa nyid ldog pa ni sems kyi gnyen po 'du byed par sgro btags pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: lan cig rjes su dpag pa'i mi mthun pa nyid ldog pa ni sems kyi gnyen po 'du byed par sgro btags pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The reversal of the disagreement of a single inference is also not the superimposition of the mental antidote of application.

original: rims nad can thams cad 'chi bar thal bar 'gyur bas gso bar rtsom pa 'bras bu med pa thal bar 'gyur bar smra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rims nad can thams cad 'chi bar thal bar 'gyur bas gso bar rtsom pa 'bras bu med pa thal bar 'gyur bar smra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that all those with contagious diseases would die, and it would follow that the undertaking of healing would be fruitless.

original: las ni nges @241b par sbyor ba la 'jog par byed dam zlog byed ma yin te /
analyzed: las ni nges @241b par sbyor ba la 'jog par byed dam zlog byed ma yin te /
translated: Its function is to definitely fix or to prevent the mind from being fixed on an object.üîΩ

original: shes pa mnyam par dang mi mnyam par sgro btags pa'i sgo nas bdag nyid 'jug pa dang ldog pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir de'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag yin no //üîΩlus kyi 'jug pa'am ldog pa yang sna tshogs pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa mnyam par dang mi mnyam par sgro btags pa'i sgo nas bdag nyid 'jug pa dang ldog pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir de'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag yin no // lus kyi 'jug pa'am ldog pa yang sna tshogs pa yin te /
translated: Action is not the cause of the engagement or nonengagement of the self, because it is the mere cause of the engagement and nonengagement of the self, through superimposing equality and inequality on cognition.

original: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang gnyi ga la yang yod pa'i phyir de dag ni gar yang gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang gnyi ga la yang yod pa'i phyir de dag ni gar yang gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The engagement and nonengagement of the self are not in any place, because the engagement and nonengagement of the body are various,üîΩand they exist in both the equal and the unequal.

original: de'i phyir mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dag ni de dag gi sgrub byed ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dag ni de dag gi sgrub byed ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the equal and the unequal are not the cause of them,

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir dang nges pa can ma yin pa ni sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ma yin pa yang mi mnyam pa med par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir dang nges pa can ma yin pa ni sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ma yin pa yang mi mnyam pa med par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are mistaken, because that which is not certain is not a cause, and because the cause of change does not make the unequal nonexist.

original: byed pa nyid yin yang ji ltar yang rnam par 'gyur ba thob pa'i phyir 'u bu cag la mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa nyid yin yang ji ltar yang rnam par 'gyur ba thob pa'i phyir 'u bu cag la mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: But even though it is the agent, it is not the same for us, because it obtains a transformation.

original: las zad pa kho na las 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir gso bar nus pa ma yin pa las yod na rnam par 'gyur ba dang tshor ba ldog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las zad pa kho na las 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir gso bar nus pa ma yin pa las yod na rnam par 'gyur ba dang tshor ba ldog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since death is only due to the exhaustion of karma, it cannot be cured. When karma exists, transformation and feeling cease.

original: mi mthun pa med pas mnyam pa yin na de mi skye ba yin pa'i phyir las yod na skyes bu'i byed pa lta bu yin gyi /
analyzed: mi mthun pa med pas mnyam pa yin na de mi skye ba yin pa'i phyir las yod na skyes bu'i byed pa lta bu yin gyi /
translated: If it is the same because there is no disagreement, then it does not arise. When karma exists, it is like the activity of a person.

original: gzhan du na gso ba thams cad 'bras bu med pa nyid kyis de lta bu'i rnam pa kho na'i rnam par 'gyur ba yod kyang 'ga' yang 'chi ba med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na gso ba thams cad 'bras bu med pa nyid kyis de lta bu'i rnam pa kho na'i rnam par 'gyur ba yod kyang 'ga' yang 'chi ba med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, since all healing would be fruitless, it would follow that even when there is such a transformation, no one would die.

original: bcud kyis len yang las yod pa kho na yin na snang ba yin te /
analyzed: bcud kyis len yang las yod pa kho na yin na snang ba yin te /
translated: Even elixirs are only apparent when karma exists.

original: lo stong la sogs par 'tsho ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis las 'khor ba thog ma med par bsags par gyur ba bcud kyis len pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba 'byung ba yongs su gyur pa phan 'dogs par byed pa'i khyad par la ltos nas tshe'i
analyzed: lo stong la sogs par 'tsho ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis las 'khor ba thog ma med par bsags par gyur ba bcud kyis len pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba 'byung ba yongs su gyur pa phan 'dogs par byed pa'i khyad par la ltos nas tshe'i
translated: Life

original: 'du byed mtshams sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed mtshams sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
translated: is connected to the formative forces in dependence on the special benefit of the transformation of the elements.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni de yongs su gyur pa skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas rang nyid kho na tshe dang mtshams sbyor ba yin te las kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir las gzhan 'ga' la yang de ltos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni de yongs su gyur pa skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas rang nyid kho na tshe dang mtshams sbyor ba yin te las kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir las gzhan 'ga' la yang de ltos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Concentration connects life to itself by generating that transformation, because it is the nature of karma. It is not dependent on any other karma.üîΩThis body is established in just that way.

original: lus 'di de lta bu kho na'i gnas pa sgrub par byed pa yin zhes gnas bsgrub par byed par mtshungs pa'i gnas skabs dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: lus 'di de lta bu kho na'i gnas pa sgrub par byed pa yin zhes gnas bsgrub par byed par mtshungs pa'i gnas skabs dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: It is similar in being established in the present.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu tshogs pa ni 'bras bu la mi slu ba yin no zhes bstan pa yin la mnyam pa yang gnas pa'i tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa yin la 'chi ba la ni mi mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu tshogs pa ni 'bras bu la mi slu ba yin no zhes bstan pa yin la mnyam pa yang gnas pa'i tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa yin la 'chi ba la ni mi mnyam pa yin no //
translated: And the equality is the establishment of the collection of causes for endurance, but the inequality is for death.

original: de dag kyang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ma @242a * //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ma @242a * //
translated: And it is taught that they do not follow desire,

original: yin par bstan pa ni lus rgyu nyid yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yin par bstan pa ni lus rgyu nyid yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because if the body were the cause,

original: de nyid kyis na de dag gi 'bras bu yang gnas pa la sogs pa 'khrul pa can yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de dag gi 'bras bu yang gnas pa la sogs pa 'khrul pa can yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: then the effect of those would be endurance and so on, which is erroneous.

original: nyes pa nye bar zhi bar gyur kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa nye bar zhi bar gyur kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even if faults are pacified,

original: nyes pas skyon can yin pa'i 'bras bu 'chi ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: nyes pas skyon can yin pa'i 'bras bu 'chi ba ma yin nam /
translated: isn‚Äôt death the effect of the fault-ridden body?

original: de ldog pa yin na rnam par 'gyur ba med par rigs pa yin na mi rigs pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de ldog pa yin na rnam par 'gyur ba med par rigs pa yin na mi rigs pa ji ltar yin /
translated: If that is reversed, it is logical that it would be without change, but how could it be illogical?

original: de log kyang de'i bskyed bya'i 'du byed ni me'i bskyed bya shing bzhin du mi ldog pa yin la de'i phyir 'khrul pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de log kyang de'i bskyed bya'i 'du byed ni me'i bskyed bya shing bzhin du mi ldog pa yin la de'i phyir 'khrul pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if that is reversed, the formations that it produces, like the wood produced by fire, are not reversed, and therefore it is not erroneous.

original: rgyu lus kyi mnyam pa'i 'bras bu la 'khrul pa yin ba ni 'dis bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu lus kyi mnyam pa'i 'bras bu la 'khrul pa yin ba ni 'dis bsal ba yin no //
translated: This refutes the error that the result of the body, which is a cause, is the same as the body.

original: de la yang mi mnyam pa'i bskyed bya 'du byed phra mo mi ldog pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de la yang mi mnyam pa'i bskyed bya 'du byed phra mo mi ldog pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that the subtle formative forces, which are not the same as the body, are not eliminated,üîΩthen NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: gal te me ni ldog na yang //
analyzed: gal te me ni ldog na yang //
translated: Even if fire were eliminated,

original: shing gi 'gyur ba mi ldog bzhin //
analyzed: shing gi 'gyur ba mi ldog bzhin //
translated: the transformation of fuel would not be eliminated.

original: de ni ldog pa med ce na //
analyzed: de ni ldog pa med ce na //
translated: If you think that it is not eliminated,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: 'chi ba'i don gyi rnam par 'gyur ba ni 'chi ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i don gyi rnam par 'gyur ba ni 'chi ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The transformation of death is the transformation of the meaning of death.

original: 'chi ba kho na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'chi ba kho na ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just death.

original: gnas pa dang 'chi ba dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang rtsod pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: gnas pa dang 'chi ba dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang rtsod pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: It is also the result of abiding and death and is the basis of dispute.

original: lan ni / ma yin gso sbyor yod phyir ro //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni / ma yin gso sbyor yod phyir ro // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is: No, because there is healing.

original: shing las me'i bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin du mi mnyam pa'i bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shing las me'i bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin du mi mnyam pa'i bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The transformation of the product of the body is not the same as the transformation of the product of fire, which is fuel.

original: gso sbyor 'bras bu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gso sbyor 'bras bu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the fruit of the healing would be nonexistent.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu cung zad kyang med pa la ni su yang sbyor bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu cung zad kyang med pa la ni su yang sbyor bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because no one would engage in the healing if there were not some fruit.

original: de'i phyir mi mnyam pa las skyes pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni bzlog bya yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi mnyam pa las skyes pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni bzlog bya yin no //
translated: Therefore, the transformation that arises from the unequal is to be rejected.

original: de'i bskyed bya rims la sogs pa gso ba'i sbyor ba la sogs pas bzlog bya yin par ni bden na rims la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'du byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya rims la sogs pa gso ba'i sbyor ba la sogs pas bzlog bya yin par ni bden na rims la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'du byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is true that the fever, etc., that it produces is to be rejected by the application of healing, etc., but not by the fever, etc.

original: de mi ldog pa las kyang 'chi ba yin zhes bya ba 'di la yang /üîΩma yin gso sbyor yod phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi ldog pa las kyang 'chi ba yin zhes bya ba 'di la yang / ma yin gso sbyor yod phyir ro //
translated: And in this case, ‚ÄúDeath is from its nonreversal,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba de kho na rjes su 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de kho na rjes su 'jug pa yin no //
translated: the reply is just this: ‚ÄúNo, because the healing exists.‚Äù

original: gal te gso ba la sogs pas rims la sogs pa ldog pa yang de'i sgo nas 'du byed pa ldog pa ma yin na de las kyang 'chi ba kho na yin na de'i tshe yang gso ba la sbyor bar mi byed de gang gi phyir ji ltar 'di
analyzed: gal te gso ba la sogs pas rims la sogs pa ldog pa yang de'i sgo nas 'du byed pa ldog pa ma yin na de las kyang 'chi ba kho na yin na de'i tshe yang gso ba la sbyor bar mi byed de gang gi phyir ji ltar 'di
translated: If the reversal of a fever, etc. through medical treatment, etc. is not the reversal of the formative forces through that, then death would occur even when that is the case.

analyzed: 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhes de la sbyor bar byed /
translated: At that time, one would not apply oneself to medical treatment, because one would think, ‚ÄúHow can I live and not die?‚Äù

original: de'i sbyor ba ma byas kyang shi ba yin na rims la sogs pa yang zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de'i don du gso ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ma byas kyang shi ba yin na rims la sogs pa yang zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de'i don du gso ba ma yin no //
translated: If one dies even though one does not apply oneself to medical treatment, then one would not be treated for the sake of that.

original: 'on te 'ga' zhig @242b rims la sogs pa'i sgo nas byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni gso ba'i sbyor bas de log na ldog pa yin la des na 'tsho ba'i phyir de ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin la 'ga' zhig gi spyi ldog pa yin pa
analyzed: 'on te 'ga' zhig @242b rims la sogs pa'i sgo nas byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni gso ba'i sbyor bas de log na ldog pa yin la des na 'tsho ba'i phyir de ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin la 'ga' zhig gi spyi ldog pa yin pa
translated: But if the transformation that occurs through a fever, etc. is reversed through the application of medical treatment, then it is reversed when that is reversed. Therefore, it is fruitful because one lives.

original: des na 'chi ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'chi ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is death.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: rnam pa gnyis kyi rgyu med pa'i phyir des bskyed pa'i mi mnyam pa'am rigs la sogs par mnyam pa yin na de'i bskyed bya 'du byed pa glog bur du ji ltar tha dad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis kyi rgyu med pa'i phyir des bskyed pa'i mi mnyam pa'am rigs la sogs par mnyam pa yin na de'i bskyed bya 'du byed pa glog bur du ji ltar tha dad par 'gyur te /
translated: Because of the teaching:

original: de dang de min dngos po can //üîΩde dang de min dngos rgyu skyes //
analyzed: de dang de min dngos po can // de dang de min dngos rgyu skyes //
translated: That which is not that and which is that

original: zhes bstan pas so //
analyzed: zhes bstan pas so //
translated: Arises from a cause that is not that and which is that.

original: me dang phrad par gcig kyang shing dang gser yul tha dad pa yin pas bzlog bya ma yin pa dang / cig shos rnam par 'gyur ba'i skyed byed du mthong ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la yul tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa yul gcig la mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: me dang phrad par gcig kyang shing dang gser yul tha dad pa yin pas bzlog bya ma yin pa dang / cig shos rnam par 'gyur ba'i skyed byed du mthong ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la yul tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa yul gcig la mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: One might think that although fire is the same in contact with both wood and gold, the place of wood and gold is different, so that the place of wood is not to be refuted, and the place of gold is not seen as the generator of change. The following is stated to show that it is illogical for a single place to have different results from different places:

original: sngar mi 'byung bas rnam par 'gyur ba skyed par byed pa 'ga' ni me dang phrad pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar mi 'byung bas rnam par 'gyur ba skyed par byed pa 'ga' ni me dang phrad pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Some, such as contact with fire, generate change because they did not previously exist.

original: 'ga' zhig ni shing la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni shing la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
translated: Some, such as the place of wood, do not.

original: 'ga' zhig ni de nyid yul gzhan gser la sogs pa la ste /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni de nyid yul gzhan gser la sogs pa la ste /
translated: Some, gold, etc., are the same in another place.

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Some‚Äù refers to those that are controlled.

original: bzlog pa yin pa ni slar 'byung ba ste /üîΩ'gyur bskyed par byed ces bya ba dang 'brel pa yin te de'i tshe nyid kho na la de bzhin du 'am /
analyzed: bzlog pa yin pa ni slar 'byung ba ste / 'gyur bskyed par byed ces bya ba dang 'brel pa yin te de'i tshe nyid kho na la de bzhin du 'am /
translated: ‚Äú The opposite‚Äù is the reverse.

original: gzhan du rnam par 'gyur ba skyed par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du rnam par 'gyur ba skyed par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it does not generate a transformation of that very thing into something else.

original: de nyid de kho na las bzlog bya rnam par 'gyur ba chung ngu yin gyi chen po ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid de kho na las bzlog bya rnam par 'gyur ba chung ngu yin gyi chen po ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: That very thing is the opposite of that, but the transformation is small, not great.

original: gang gi chung du bzlog bya yin pa de'i chen po yang yin te /
analyzed: gang gi chung du bzlog bya yin pa de'i chen po yang yin te /
translated: That which is small is the opposite, and that which is great is also that.

original: dper na gser me dang phrad pa las zhu ba nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gser me dang phrad pa las zhu ba nyid lta bu'o //

original: de nyid sman gyi khyad par las gzhan du yin no //
analyzed: de nyid sman gyi khyad par las gzhan du yin no //
translated: That very thing is different due to the special medicine.

original: gang gi rnam par 'gyur ba chan po bzlog bya ma yin pa'i de'i chung ngu yang yin te /
analyzed: gang gi rnam par 'gyur ba chan po bzlog bya ma yin pa'i de'i chung ngu yang yin te /

analyzed: dper na shing me dang phrad pa las lta bu'o zhes dgongs pas gsungs pa ni dang po'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: For example, it is like a tree that encounters fire.

analyzed: slar 'byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba bskyed par byas pa gang yin pa chung yang zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa yin te /
